price: Nokorε sε Yεde Furqaan maa Mose ne Aaron, ne nhyerεnee ne afutusεm dema Nyame surofoͻ no.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَىٰ وَهَٰرُونَ ٱلۡفُرۡقَانَ وَضِيَآءٗ وَذِكۡرٗا لِّلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā wahārūna al-fur'qāna waḍiyāan wadhik'ran lil'muttaqīna
